name: Versata
defeated: This place no longer needs us. Neither do we need this place.
neutralHello: What might be the reason for your visit?.
neutralLetsHearIt: We would like to hear your proposal.
afterPeace: Very well. May we live in peaceful cooperation.
tradeRequest: Let us build our future together.
uniques: [1] population [in capital] <during a Golden Age> <with [10]% chance>

name: Absenta
declaringWar: Have you not seen this coming?
defeated: This is all part of a greater plan.
introduction: We know a lot about you.
neutralNo: This is not in our interests.
afterPeace: Very well. Peace is in your best interest.
tradeRequest: Are you interested in an exchange?
